page.title: 15LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: We have a Parish council of 7 members ,elected every 4 years,the next election being in 1987.It is the village form of local goverment .This Council looks after the provision of seats in the village,bins for litter in the streets,looks at planning applications for new buildings in the village and passes on sugestions and complaints to the next higher up council ,the borough of the High Peak at Buxton. In our 1984 local Council surveyed roads and street lighting with a view to improving it.Mostly its problems have to do with litter and with peoples planning aplications.The Chairman thinks that Castleton will not alter much in the next 10 years except for the extension at Midland Ross Electronics factory which is to engage 200 new workers soon.
